3: Ahem, this is Nanami, I'm nine years old! And today I'll be recording my life with a digital diary!
Nanami is definitely not recording this because it is required homework...
By recording my daily life, Nanami will get to look back and remember all the good times! That's what the teacher's been telling Nanami!
Ahem, ummm, what should I record today...
Ah, let's begin with Nanami and her family!
Nanami's family has a daddy, a mommy, a Nanami... ah, and Mimi!
Mimi's a shepherd dog and loves sleeping beneath the sofa! And head rubs! Every time, Mimi goes awoo when Nanami begins giving scratches.
And Nanami's daddy and mommy are the bestest daddy and mommy in the world! They love Nanami the most! Nanami loves them the most too!
Nanami, food's ready! It's your favorite dish. But remember to wash your hands.
Awoo! Favorite dish! Nanami's coming! Okay, record for today's done!
